channel.title: [317] RuneRemix - need testers - hamachi
channel.description:
Hey
As i'm working on my first source, i was thinking to get some testers. But i can't host online (that's why i will use hamachi!)
Pics will be added soon when i have most skills added and most stuff ready. Do not hate me or what ever, don't like it, leave now.. Yes i am dutch.
Idea: Home = edge To enter wildy you have to choose a god, you can only fight aggains other gods. (yes this works already) All items in server will be dropped by npc's. The only shops is general store to sell/buy junk. The idea is to get a nice economy, and give skillers a meaning in the game.
To join: Runeremix1 password: 123
Client: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/hvi9ac3n7n5wscg/RuneRemix%20client%20%28hamachi%29.rar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/hvi9ac3n7n5wscg/RuneRemix%20client%20%28hamachi%29.rar[/url]

item.title: [317] RuneRemix - need testers - hamachi
item.dc:creator: @flexz999 flexz999
item.description:
@flexz999 wrote:

strucker:

i will mybe try it, whats the hamachi name?

RuneRemix
pass: 123

[quote=“tyb97, post:7, topic:464254”][quote author=flexz999 link=topic=568136.msg4125309#msg4125309 date=1350331740]

base?

To be fair, no idea…
I had it from a friend. But just so you know, client.class was 500kb, i did some changes and removed junk, now only 350kb
What i’m doing is adding skills on the way i’m coding the server, so every skill that players can do will be fixed.

Also, you can not go out the spawn, i work on area’s, when it’s done i open it for players.
this way i am able to remove MOST bugs in the game.
[/quote]
bolded the luls.[/quote]

Whats wrong with that?

Read full topic
